metadataAttributes.Title: Embedding Sensors and Motors Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Experience Sensors and Motors in an IoT World. Master sensor and motor theory, and program these devices in a microprocessor system.
metadataAttributes.Skills: sensor integration, firmware, motor design, embedded engineering, hardware, Analog hardware, Pressure and force sensors, Sensor architecture, PSoc Programming, Circuit Design, Sensor manufacturing, PID control,
